title: Bookkeeper
job_overview:
Job Overview:
Responsible for managing and recording financial transactions, maintaining accurate records, and ensuring timely processing of accounts payable/receivable, payroll, and general ledger entries.

Key Responsibilities:
Record financial transactions and update ledgers.
Process payroll and track employee benefits.
Manage accounts payable and receivable.
Reconcile bank statements and accounts.
Prepare financial reports and assist with audits.
Ensure compliance with company policies and regulations.

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a bookkeeper or in a similar role.
Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks).
Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
Knowledge of accounting principles and practices.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume to apply for the position.
